name: ICUAdmissionOrTransfer
title: ICU Admission or Transfer
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains encounters for admission or transfers to intensive care units (ICU).),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who are transferred to intensive care units. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular elements will map to "Encounter, Performed".),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes representing admissions to ICU.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
